document_data.name: Losiir
document_data.mainbody:
'''Losiir''' was a [[githyanki]] [[warrior]] who traversed the [[planes]] in service of the githyanki [[Lich Queen]], [[Vlaakith CLVII]].
{{Quote|''Losiir is gone. His [[spirit]] now swims the [[Astral Plane|Astral Sea]].''|Lae'zel upon seeing Losiir's dead body.}}
document_data.Possessions: During the assault on the [[nautiloid]], Losiir wore a [[githyanki half-plate]] and [[githyanki boots]]. As a fighter he used a [[longbow]] and a [[scimitar]]. He also had two ''[[potions of healing]]'', a ''[[scroll]] of [[revivify]]'', and a [[tourmaline]] [[ring]]. Losiir had a [[githyanki silver sword]], but he lost it after being captured by [[mind flayer]]s.
document_data.History:
Losiir was a githyanki soldier from [[crèche K'liir]]. In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, he was a member of a group of [[Githyanki#Relationships|githyanki dragon rider]]s chasing a [[mind flayer]] nautiloid to obtain the [[Astral Prism]]. During the assault on the nautiloid, Losiir was captured. Mind flayers inserted a tadpole into his eye thus beginning the process of [[ceremorphosis]]. He managed to escape the capsule where he was detained when the ship was in [[Avernus]]. Losiir headed to the [[Spelljamming helm|nautiloid's helm]] while trying to take control of the [[vessel]] and fighting the attacking [[imp]]s. He planned to get to a crèche where he could be cleansed of the tadpole via a [[zaith'isk]].

However, Losiir and the tadpole in his head died in the crash of the nautiloid. Some said that they saw a githyanki corpse on the [[Ravaged Beach]] while the others insisted that his body was hidden by Lae'zel when she woke up after the crash.{{Speculation}}
